general.description: As its name implies, Ocean is a wet planet, with a temperate climate and lush ecosystems, a delight for Pupeteer settlers. It is the latest colony of the Thirteen Planets. Its major ecosystems are or course marine, but it is also known for its airborne creatures : gigantic medusae floating near the stratosphere amidst clouds of aerial plancton and manta-like flyers following the jetstreams using naturally occuring pulsoreactors.
general.bar: The floating station's bar is crowded by Pupeteers and a few other sentients
